LanguageData.DesignatorCancelDesc: Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
LanguageData.DesignatorCutPlantsDesc: Marks plants to be cut and destroyed. The plant will be completely removed, and any food will be harvested.
LanguageData.DesignatorDeconstructDesc: Deconstruct buildings and reclaim part of their resources.
LanguageData.DesignatorHarvestDesc: Marks plants to be harvested for their food or other products.
LanguageData.DesignatorHarvestWoodDesc: Marks trees to be chopped down for wood.
LanguageData.DesignatorHaulThingsDesc: Mark rock chunks and other items to be hauled to dumping areas. Not needed for things like food or corpses, which are always haulable.
LanguageData.MustHaulHaulables: Can only designate haulable but non-always-hauled things (like rock chunks).
LanguageData.DesignatorHuntDesc: Mark animals to be hunted by your hunters.
LanguageData.DesignatorMineDesc: Designate areas of rock to be mined out.
LanguageData.DesignatorSmoothFloorDesc: Designate rough stone terrain to be smoothed.
LanguageData.DesignatorPlanDesc: Place planning designations. These don't do anything except help you plan future expansions.
LanguageData.DesignatorHomeRegionAddDesc: Colonists will repair buildings, clean floors, and extinguish fires only in the home region.
LanguageData.DesignatorHomeRegionRemoveDesc: Removes a home region. Colonists will no longer clean, repair, or extinguish fires here.
LanguageData.DesignatorRegionNoRoofAddDesc: Create a region where roofs will not generate. Colonists will also tear down existing roofs here.
LanguageData.DesignatorRegionNoRoofRemoveDesc: Removes a no-roof region. Roofs will generate here, and existing roofs will not be torn down.
LanguageData.DesignatorRegionSnowClearAddDesc: Create a region which colonists will try to keep clear of snow.
LanguageData.DesignatorRegionSnowClearRemoveDesc: Removes a snow clearing. Colonists will no longer try to keep this area clear of snow.
LanguageData.DesignatorGrowingZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow a certain kind of plant.
LanguageData.DesignatorZoneCreateStorageResourcesDesc: Create a stockpile where your colonists will store resources.\nThis tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
LanguageData.DesignatorZoneCreateStorageDumpingDesc: Create a stockpile where your colonists will store junk.\nThis tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
LanguageData.DesignatorZoneDeleteDesc: Remove zones, like stockpile zones or growing zones.
LanguageData.DesignatorClaimDesc: Claim neutral structures for the colony, including ancient ruins and abandoned siege bases. Claimed structures can be repaired and maintained by your colonists.
LanguageData.InteractionSpotOutOfBounds: Interaction spot is out of bounds.
LanguageData.InteractionSpotWillBeBlocked: Interaction spot will be blocked by {0}.
LanguageData.TerrainBeingSmoothed: The terrain is already marked for smoothing.
LanguageData.TerrainCannotSupport: The terrain here cannot support this.

DesignatorUninstallDesc: Uninstall this so it can be moved, sold, or installed somewhere else.
DesignatorAreaSnowClearClearDesc: Removes a snow clearing area. Colonists will no longer try to keep this area clear of snow.
DesignatorAreaBuildRoofExpandDesc: Colonists will build roofs in this area.
DesignatorAreaHomeClearDesc: Removes a home area. Colonists will no longer clean, repair, or extinguish fires here.
DesignatorRemoveFloorDesc: Remove floors to reveal the terrain underneath.
DesignatorClearAreaAllowedDesc: Clear cells from an allowed area.\n\nAllowed area are defined areas you can assign to colonists. Colonists will not accept work or fulfill their needs outside their allowed area.
DesignatorAreaNoRoofClearDesc: Removes no-roof area, so colonists will no longer remove roofs.
DesignatorAreaNoRoofExpandDesc: Colonists will remove roofs in this area (except overhead mountain, which cannot be removed).
DesignatorAreaHomeExpandDesc: Colonists will repair buildings, clean floors, and extinguish fires only in the home area.
DesignatorAreaSnowClearExpandDesc: Create a area which colonists will try to keep clear of snow.
DesignatorStripDesc: Strip apparel from corpses and the wounded.
DesignatorExpandAreaAllowedDesc: Expand an allowed area.\n\nAllowed areas are defined areas you can assign to colonists. Colonists will not accept work or fulfill their needs outside their allowed area.
DesignatorRearmTrapDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again.
DesignatorAreaBuildRoofClearDesc: Remove the area where colonists will build roofs. Existing roofs will remain, but colonists won't build more.
